name: purescript-webpack-skeleton
description: Simple skeleton for setting up projects with purescript and webpack

scripts.dev-osx: fswatch -o src -r | xargs -n 1 -I {} pulp build & ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch && fg
scripts.dev: inotifywait src -r -e modify -m | xargs -n 1 -I {} pulp build & ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch && fg

author: Micha≈Ç Adamczyk <michal.anks@gmail.com>
